mapper.select: select cwt.type, doi.house_id as houseId, doi.shop_count as shopCount, doi.ask_count as askCount, doi.return_count as returnCount from dj_deliver_order doa INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_item doi on doa.id = doi.order_id INNER JOIN dj_core_worker_type cwt on doa.worker_type_id = cwt.id where doa.house_id = #{houseId}
select mtr.state, mtr.house_id as houseId, chf.type from dj_matter_technology_record mtr INNER JOIN dj_core_worker_type chf on mtr.worker_type_id = chf.id where mtr.house_id = #{houseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE dj_deliver_order_item SET reservation_deliver_time = NULL WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
